titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain synthetic staple fibers that are not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
12/11/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain synthetic staple fibers that are not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning.
